name: CIDataMatrixCodeDescriptor
desc: A concrete subclass of CIBarcodeDescriptor that represents a Data Matrix code symbol.

items.name: init?(payload: Data, rowCount: Int, columnCount: Int, eccVersion: CIDataMatrixCodeDescriptor.ECCVersion)
items.desc: Initializes a descriptor that can be used as input to the CIBarcodeGenerator filter.

items.name: var errorCorrectedPayload: Data
items.desc: The error-corrected payload that comprises the Data Matrix code symbol.

items.name: var eccVersion: CIDataMatrixCodeDescriptor.ECCVersion
items.desc: The Data Matrix code ECC version.

items.name: enum CIDataMatrixCodeDescriptor.ECCVersion
items.desc: Constants concerning Data Matrix code ECC version.
